title: Voices from a war (MAC & PC)
creator_credit: Ryebuck Media, Interactive Multimedia and Australian War Memorial
brief_description: This CD-ROM and guide contains screens of photos, paintings, objects, letters, diaries and original archival material from the Australian War Memorial. In particular it looks at the Siege of Tobruk, The Battle for Papua, and The Sandakan-Ranau Death Marches. An education guide accompanies this CD-ROM with useful study topics and resource material. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Colour capable Macintosh, or MPC2 standard PC with 8 mb available RAM, double speed CD ROM drive and hard disk. QuickTime 2.5 for Macintosh or QuickTime 2.1 for Windows (supplied).
